title: 820-00850 liquid no display
message:
Hi,
this board receive liquid near LVDS connector, the Mac start (I think) I have backlight on keyboard, light on usb mouse.
I look defect component near U7100 (C7101,C7100,R7101,R7100 and some strap).
I haven't the same board to change U7100, can I take it on 820-00239?
thanks
Best regards

title: 820-00850 liquid no display
message:
Do you get L7210/20/70 voltage?

Any ISL95828 will work...

i ear the Mac with voice over (three push on power button), I try the display on other Mac, he work well.

title: 820-00850 liquid no display
message:
Seems that iGPU is completely damaged; not only internal eDP output.
Did you try external video disconnecting internal LCD?
